job_tasks.phrase: leveren van applicaties (bijv. user interfaces, sales en service processes, B2C en B2B communities, APIs, mobile apps, Einstein of Heroku);
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building and delivering various types of software applications, including user interfaces, APIs, and mobile apps, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Ernaar streven om altijd kwaliteit en veiligheid voorop te stellen in alles wat we doen.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the importance of quality and security in software delivery, which are fundamental aspects of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zult werken met klanten die vaak Agile werken om nieuwe functionaliteit te ontwikkelen en implementeren met behulp van het toonaangevende SaaS-platform, Salesforce.
job_tasks.justification: This describes working within an Agile framework to develop and implement new functionality, which is a core software development practice, specifically mentioning integration with a SaaS platform (Salesforce).

job_tasks.phrase: Je wordt verwacht samen te werken met de klant en betrokken te zijn bij zowel functionele als technische workshops om klantvereisten te verzamelen en te documenteren.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding client needs through workshops and documenting requirements, which aligns with understanding business context and translating it into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Uitdagingen en verbeteringen communiceren aan de klant en de klanten en eindgebruikers ondersteunen tijdens en na de Go-Live.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions communicating challenges and improvements to clients and supporting end-users, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Innovatieve technologieën zoals GenAI, Conversational AI, Voice Assistants en andere geavanceerde oplossingen verkennen en toepassen, met een focus op het bevorderen van creatief denken en het stimuleren van impactvolle zakelijke innovatie.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves exploring and applying innovative technologies like GenAI, which falls under the specialization of AI/ML model development and application, even if the specifics of model development aren't detailed.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software development tasks (1.A.1) such as delivering applications, working with Salesforce, and integrating functionality. While it mentions exploring and applying GenAI technologies (1.B.1), the core responsibilities lean heavily towards software engineering with AI as an added area of exploration rather than the central focus of model development or deep AI specialization. The role involves integrating these technologies into existing systems and client solutions, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development tasks and mentions AI/GenAI as an area of exploration. The distinction between core software engineering and AI specialization is evident, allowing for a confident profile assignment. However, the depth of AI involvement is not as detailed as in a dedicated AI/ML role, preventing a perfect score.
